website_summaries.verdict: A solid 1.7-liter product for someone who wants a safe, BPA-free kettle.
pros: Easy, convenient and safe to use
Heats water quickly, but remains cool to the touch
cons: Some customers reported issues with interior rusting

customer_reviews.title: Made in CHINA
customer_reviews.text: False advertising--Buyer BEWARE! This product is NOT made in Austria or Germany. Misleading product photo shows German flag, wording states "Mueller of Austria" ... "American Standard"... but it is MADE in CHINA!!! I bought this kettle thinking it was made in Austria or Germany. Expecting a quality product. Only when I read the manual did I see that this product is not made in Europe--deceived by advertising. The metal plate inside bottom of kettle shows spots--only used three times. Also condensation that builds up inside after boiling stays for hours. I have owned a few different electric tea kettles and that never happened. I am sending back ASAP--I'm worried about the quality and very upset over the deceitful advertising.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Lid jams and gets stuck.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this at first but unfortunately I noticed water leaking through the lid when tilted and about a week later it started to jam and get stuck so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: PKJ

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality, made in China.
customer_reviews.text: A rusty spot on the bottom after the first time use, the shiny metal of the bottom is not made by stainless? Can't be used as a teapot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very streamlined electric kettle. The blue LED lets you know the water is boiling. There is a max line and it is about a simple as it gets. Who doesn't want a beautiful, well made, easy to use electric kettle?
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Povsner

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: I see rust just after 2 weeks of use , it's crazy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nutza ip

customer_reviews.title: Boiled water tastes like burning plastic
customer_reviews.text: Boiled Water tastes like burning plastic! After one month, I just missed the return window by a couple of days. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: great product and company
customer_reviews.text: have had this kettle since August 2019....work awesome....and I use it most everyday. Had to reach out to this company for some help.... their response time was very quick and helpful. Would recommend you choose this kettle over any other in this price range for both reasons. You will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Mueller's tea kettles since 2016, and only until the other day did the original model I purchased finally give out. For the amount of use the kettle went through( my family loves to drink tea) I am pleasantly surprised for a product at such a good price to be so durable, and reliable. The new 2019 model just arrived, and was a quick 2 minute process from unboxing to boiling some water. Clean look, and easy to use. In addition, if contacted directly, the customer service at Mueller company is excellent. Quick response time, very friendly, and will do whatever they can to help with an issue you have.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Averbukh

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful device
customer_reviews.text: This kettle is fantastic! I filled it up to the first line and turned it on and by the time I got a bowl down from the cabinet, put some instant oatmeal in it and walked back to it, it had just clicked off and the water was at a rolling boil. Also, I think it’s the most beautiful appliance I have now.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Rust in 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to try this as German products are typically the best. Was super disappointed when the screw rusted in 2 days. Don’t bother with this one. Only good thing was amazons return policy. Thank you amazon for being the best online retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean bec neck and opening of container is too small.
customer_reviews.text: Once glass container was empty, it took 2-3 days for steam to dissipate. Bottom of glass container has light rust color stain and water stains too much even though I used bottled water. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn't open far enough
customer_reviews.text: The lid opening is so small you can barely get water into it without splashing/spilling it all over, let alone to try to clean it. Too annoying. Also don't like the fact that the "filter"/screen isn't able to be removed and cleaned. Returning it. Whoever designed and/or approved it isn't someone who uses a product like this, clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and good
customer_reviews.text: The handle gets hot when pouring water into cups. Doesnt heat up especially fast. I've had others that boiled quicker. Looking forward to seeing if I can get a couple years out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hunter

customer_reviews.title: I had to update my review from one to 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with the lid because it is not removable, but as time as gone along I do not have an issue with the lid. I use this pot at least once a day. I love it now.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONAHOLIC

customer_reviews.title: One big flaw
customer_reviews.text: Hubby uses an electric kettle at least twice a day so he needs something easy to fill with an accurate pour spout. This kettle is attractive and works as it should...BUT the lid only opens a little more than half way. This makes it awkward to fill. And while boiling vinegar may clean it, if you have water that leaves scaling and would like to clean it with a plastic scrubber, forget it. You can't get your hand inside. Major drawback for me. For this reason, I wouldn't recommend the kettle.
customer_reviews.author: Bamabelle

customer_reviews.title: Decent Kettle with poor lid design
customer_reviews.text: After 30-45 days of use, we remain happy with this purchase. It functions as advertised. However, my chief complaint is that the tid opening mechanism to add water is weak and provides very limited access. keep in mind you have to fill the kettle regularly so this annoying feature will persist over the life ofthe kettle
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: Not made where you might think
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating this kettle a 3, even though it probably merits a 4 or 5. The problem is deceptive advertising. The kettle carries a German name, boasts of a German design award and the description states that it is manufactured by "Mueller Austria". Yet, it turns out to have been "made in China". Amazon should be more forthright with its loyal customers by clearly indicating where products are made.
customer_reviews.author: Aspizon

customer_reviews.title: Most entertaining kettle!
customer_reviews.text: Love the blue light and bubbling water show! Boils water quickly. The glass container shows how clean it is and doesn't add any off flavor. Also, very happy about the auto shutoff for all those times the kids call me away to do something else, I know it won't boil dry. Buy it! You'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenom

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, fast, and functional
customer_reviews.text: I use an electronic kettle for hot water for my French press, tea, and when I do canning and need hot water on standby. I purchased this to replace an old kettle. It has a beautiful, clean, and functional design. The clear view glass allows to watch your water boil. The switch is in a much better place than my old kettle; it is on the handle where I won't bump it And the lights?! Genius. I hope they last a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Timlin

customer_reviews.title: ON/OFF switch failed after ONE MONTH of use
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use....the ON/OFF switch broke down... It pops to the OFF position half way through warming the water.. I also don't like that the lid does not easily open all the way up, you must force-open it to have an easier way of filling the kettle with water. Overall, truly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good 😊
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a kettle for myself a friend suggested I get this one being they were happy with theirs. I too, was impressed with the reviews and decided to give this a try. Received a few days ago and so far I'm very pleased with the design and efficiency. Boils water quickly. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lambrecht

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glass kettle
customer_reviews.text: I have been using glass kettles for many years and love them. My favorite glass kettle has flaws that has not been resolved, so I tried this Meuller kettle and, not knowing what to expect, I was delighted. It is larger than some which is great for a 10 cup teapot. The only complaint, if you could even call it that, would be the length of time it takes to boil compared with my favorite. It would be interesting to see how long this kettle would last, but other than that, it comes highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Lid jams, I am not sure this kettle will live up to its reported ratings. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The lid jams, it takes repeated pushing of release knob to open the lid. The spring release mechanism seems to be the issue. It is a great design but there has been a flaw in manufacturing or "rough" handling during delivery. Not sure if the seller is aware. I have been using electric kettles for over 30 years. I bought this because it was given a design award in Germany, I was expecting good design and German reliability. I will update this post if the Seller responds. I got 11 years of mileage out of my British Russell Hobbs electric kettle, was hoping for at least 5 years out of this one! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: After a month and a half - it began to smell like burning plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 5th or 6th electric kettle in 15 years. Their lifetime is generally in the range of ~3 years; some better than others. I purchased this kettle at the end of September and yesterday (1.5 months later) we noticed a foul burning smell coming from it. Clearly I can't use it anymore and it's past the return date. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MB_NYC

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After Only Four Months - Money Down the Drain
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this kettle, but after only four months of using, it completely stopped working. I never let the elements on the bottom get wet and regularly cleaned it according to the instructions. It just stopped working all of a sudden. Now it is too late to get a refund. I am very disappointed with this product and will not repurchase this type of kettle. I'll go back to the old fashioned one that sits on my stove top.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveLucyFan

customer_reviews.title: Great kettle. Have never owned better.
customer_reviews.text: Short and sweet review: we have 2 of these. One is in its second year of daily (multiple times/day) use, looks great, no weird smells (never did smell - think some folks mentioned that ??), and boils as fast as most things beyond a commercial stove. Needed another for my studio tea breaks, so that's why no. 2 was bought. Only thing I noticed about it is that the old one still looks as good as the one out of the box. Groovy blue lights too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mutchler

customer_reviews.title: Updated:  Poltergeist kettle
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: the kettle has now died. Not even 4 months. UPDATE: not a happy camper anymore. The kettle has started turning on by itself. I've had it since early January and of course out of the return period. Obviously cant use for safety reasons. Really, really disappointed given the great reviews, I had looked for months to find the kettle I wanted. Had wanted to get a kettle forever and finally settled on this one. I seriously use this 3-4 times a day. It heats up in an expected time depending on how much water you are boiling. I've cleaned once with some water and vinegar and that worked perfectly to remove some scale at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: txkiwi

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, easy to use, makes water hot.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for our own home and everyone liked it so well that my parents requested one for the office. It doesn't have bells and whistles (literally or figuratively) save the cool blue glow, but it does the job well. The outside does get very hot (boiling water against glass...) and the blue glow is attractive, so I would not recommend for a household with curious toddlers, but we put ours back on the counter with the cord wrapped under the device as intended, and it is out of the way and no one can pull it forward. We use ours constantly and it is going strong, second one just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Glad I went ahead and got this. So very easy to use, and water heats up lightening fast. As far as the negative reviews that stopped working after a couple months read the paper work that comes with it. When you register its a 2 year warranty. Doesn't get any better than that! I emailed Mueller and heard back from them in less than 1 hour. Very happy, love the light and auto shut off. I am happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Monsipapa

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrific. I wanted a pot to heat up water for tea and instant coffee or hot chocolate. Also something that did not need to be put on the stove. I liked the sleek design of this kettle along with the fact that it was electric. I have used it several times and could not be more pleased. The water comes to a boil much quicker than our old tea kettle. I also love the automatic shut off and the fact that if you try to turn it on without putting water in it shuts off immediately. I highly recommend this kettle.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Love electric kettles. And this is pretty - but do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Just got this kettle - looks really nice and it was quick and noiseless. My one cup coffee maker doesn’t get water hot enough for tea! I’ll add to this post about reliability in a couple of months. Addition - kettle stopped working in December - got a replacement easily. However the second kettle stopped working after a couple of months. Going to buy a different kind!! CANNOT RECOMMEND Also I believe all the positive reviews are because they literally give you 10 dollars for submitting a review. And they nag you until it appears on the Amazon website. So all the reviews posted are probably from before people even take it out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: the scot in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support!
customer_reviews.text: First unit started malfunctioning after a couple of months, which was disappointing, but a quick e-mail to Mueller's customer support solved the issue. They were quick to apologize and offer a replacement, which I really appreciate. Highly recommend. When working properly, the kettle is definitely worth the money! Would recommend using filtered water to slow down the buildup of scale on the heating element. The small-ish opening at the top of the kettle means it would be hard to clean any serious buildup just by soaking it with vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bell

customer_reviews.title: Failure of equipment after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this couple of months back. This morning (July 27, 2020) the electric kettle failed to turn on when I turned on the switch. Checked power supply with other equipment and was OK. Looked for some reset button at the bottom of this kettle and did not find any. Let it cool off and still didn't turn on. I think I am entitled to a refund or replacement from the seller. I can return this defective piece of equipment if the seller wants. I am hoping that the seller will contact me via Amazon. Note: Before failure it worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Deven Bhan

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kettle and after less then 2 weeks the handle came apart exposing the wiring. So I took a chance and reordered a new one. The second one, after it boiled was supposed to shut of. And it kind of did. Just not all the way. Which I didn't know. Came home from work to find the teapot on and almost boiled dry. Had no idea what had happened. So I refilled it, and boiled water, all looked okay. But when the water cooled the kettle turned back on by itself. Also the opening is so small it is hard to clean inside. Returned both and bought a trusted brand name with the same features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes water taste like plastic after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: The water that was boiled in it started to taste like plastic after only 4 weeks of use. The container also started giving off a very strong plastic smell that could also be tasted in all beverages made with it. I only ever boiled water in it so I don't know how it got that taste. Very disappointing as the ceramic tea maker I had previously owned never had this issue in several years of use.
customer_reviews.author: IlikewhatIsee

customer_reviews.title: Update: Happy with the replacement
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier with the service level and responsiveness from the company, as well as the replacement I received. They contacted me back promptly and sent out a new kettle right away. Nearly six months later, it is working properly and without any problems. I really think they just happened to get a defective batch, and my initial purchase happened to be from that batch.
customer_reviews.author: OR

customer_reviews.title: Is it malfunctioning, Haunted or user error.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new just arrived today. I will update this review once I get answers regarding this kettle turning on by it's self. I boiled water about 2 hours ago. The kettle turned off. I went back to the kitchen a few minutes ago(2hours after pot turned off) and as soon as I walked into the dark kitchen the blue light turned on and it started boiling water. Don't get me wrong this would be an awesome feature however I think something is amiss here. Either this thing is malfunctioning, haunted or it's suppose to keep the water warm. Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Daytona

customer_reviews.title: Beware this product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 2 weeks. Loved the fast boil and the fancy blue light. I didn't like that the lid only part way opened, made it difficult to fill & clean inside. But yesterday it started generating a terrible burning electrical/plastic smell that seems to be coming from the top of the handle and the lid. Fills the whole house with the smell, I'm worried it might melt or catch fire. Even if someone doesn't mind the smell of electrical fires in their kitchen, it makes the water taste terrible now too. This is not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a glass kettle with white plastic rims. It broke after 2+ years so we bought this one. In comparison, I notice: 1. This one doesn't dry as easily after use and builds up condensation inside, unless you open the lid 2. The spout is plastic, which is probably ok but my other one was glass and I feel safer with that 3. The opening on top is quite small, you might need a brush to get in there to clean rather than your hands with a sponge All in all, if this breaks again I will look for one that has a glass spout, personally preference.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: The lid won't last
customer_reviews.text: I liked this electric kettle to begin with. It heated about a minute faster than the previous 3 or 4 I have had-about 5 minutes to full boil vs 6 for most if that matters to you. The lid opening seemed small and a bit awkward to fill, and it would have been difficult to reach inside to clean, but that problem has solved itself by the lid hinge disintegrating the other day. The pot still works fine, but it has to cool down before you can stick something down the edge to take the lid up, which now comes completely off. Design flaw if the plastic hinge can't stand heat!! NOT recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Heats water fast
customer_reviews.text: Heats water speedily, within minutes. Aesthetically pleasing in the kitchen area, the blue light that is on whilst the water is boiling is a welcome feature. Would highly recommend. Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Love using it but...
customer_reviews.text: It only lasted about 1 year then the heating element stopped working so we bought another one because we did not know which part quit, the pot or the heating element. So now we know. It does work great however I wish I could find something that does not quit in a year. Product came very quickly and was as described. I hope this one lasts longer than the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Sister Kaite

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 6 weeks, originally worked fine. Last night I made some tea, and the kettle had auto shut off itself. I came downstairs this morning to find the kettle was back on again and quite warm. Completely dry, of course. Not good. While they try to portray themselves as a European product, this really is just generic Chinese product.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Burning plastic taste after 2 months. Bonus smells like crayons!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first two months I had it. Then it started making the water taste heavily of burnt plastic and there is a slight odor of melting crayons while it's heating. Obviously I can't use it anymore. It has never been used for anything other than water or had anything done to it that may have damaged it.
customer_reviews.author: blank

customer_reviews.title: Stylish way to brew a cuppa
customer_reviews.text: Who knew boiling water could be so stylish? I bought this kettle for my work desk in my man cave so I didn’t have to keep going into the house to get a cup of tea during this Coronavirus season. I love the look and build of this product. The LED light highlights the boiling water through the clear glass and the heating element design means the water seems to get pushed through the bottom holes upwards in a cycling motion. Every cup of tea comes with a little show.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Quick boiling time
customer_reviews.text: My old kettle took over 3 minutes to boil 0.5l, where as this beauty does it in just over 2 minutes. I like that you can see the the water levels a lot easier than other kettles. I wish the top would open up a little more than it should.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality, multi-functional, great value!
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that build quality is superior! *It is very stylish and I love that the whole kettle lights up. *I also love the large capacity and that it comes to a boil quickly. I have been using it to fill my canning jars and it has proven to be an invaluable time saver!!! *The 360° kettle rotation and the ability to transport it to any desired location leaving the electric base behind is liberating! *I also appreciate the fact that it has an automatic shut off saftey feature! I can think of multiple uses for this lovely kettle and so glad I purchased it! So much nicer than using the microwave! I ♥️ LOVE ♥️ IT!!! 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pasqua

customer_reviews.title: Amazon need to clean fake good reviews of the product
customer_reviews.text: After use for 2 months now Look at the video how this cattle perform when it’s getting close to boiling...and it broke down now, totally garbage! in China this product only sell 5 dollars for our experience. But I did expect this would be improved version. Don’t believe their Germany ad trick lol
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: If you like plastic & harmful chemicals in your water
customer_reviews.text: Beware... as with almost everything, this product is Made in China. Don't fall for the false advertising that it's Austrian. The spout from where the water pours out of is entirely made of plastic therefore the water actually comes into contact with plastic when pouring. Also, water tastes like plastic and chemicals... I even used filtered water. This is a crappy product, horrible design & flawed.
customer_reviews.author: st0rm

customer_reviews.title: No longer Exactly what I needed! - SUDDENLY WONT TURN ON
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and easy to use! - updating my review as I wrote that one to get a free gift. Which also the free gift looks like a piece of garbage. I loved this electric kettle and showed it off to anyone who came over. Unfortunately after just 2 weeks of use it suddenly stopped working. I really don’t know what went wrong but I am entirely dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 6 months of usage
customer_reviews.text: At our household, we are using this electric kettle everyday multiple time for last 6 months. This is a great product. Very well build, sturdy and safe. 1 liter water take about 3 minutes to boil from start which is faster than previous kettle I had. The light gives a nice touch which working. Easy to hand clean due to wide mouth. Update in June: The kettle broken after 6 months of usage to downgrading the rating to 1. The glass cracked. Was expecting to last longer
customer_reviews.author: Ujjal Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: Good, but lid failed quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this kettle. Pros: The boiling time is great. The base feels sturdy and looks very nice. Pours well. Cons: Used less than a week and the lid is already malfunctioning. Pressing the button doesn’t reliably open the lid. When the lid opens, it’s often not fully. I use my kettle at least twice a day. Wish I spent a little more for a more reliable one.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M

customer_reviews.title: SAFETY ISSUE
customer_reviews.text: SAFETY ISSUE!!! I bought one for work and loved it so bought one for home. I changed jobs so I brought it home. That’s when I looked at the bottom!!! There is a spot that go so hot it melted through the hard plastic! Thank God it didn’t start a fire!!! Pic included.
customer_reviews.author: anna m jones

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: This kettle works well. Heats up the water to a roiling boil within minutes, and has a pretty blue LED light inside, too. My only dislike is that, when it automatically shuts off after it finishes boiling, it does not make any sound to indicate that the water is done. I had a light-up kettle very similar to this one prior, which I had to replace after years of use, but that particular model would make a clicking noise every time it would self-shut off. This kettle is just silent - so if I'm not paying attention to it, I would not be able to tell when the water is ready right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Returned: Top Button to Open Lid Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot of reviews and it looked like a good product. When I got it it looked great... however, the top button that opens the lid didn't always work. Poor design? Also, the lid while it opens fully to easily fill it, you can't get your hand in it to clean it well, unless you've got rather small hands! Easy enough to use a brush, but just sharing for others who are looking for a large opening!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST KETTLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kettle because I wanted something that would fit in a small area on my counter and heat water quickly without too much fuss. This is perfect. It heats to a full boil faster than my on-stove kettle ever did, has an auto shut-off so I never need to worry about it heating a dry kettle or over boiling, and it's literally a "one-button" operation. IF I had a complaint its that this doesn't have a temperature setting option and it heats the water to boiling faster than I'm used to. So I often end up with tea that's too hot and I need to wait for it to cool. Otherwise, this thing is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina M. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Attractive......but slow and cumbersome.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a replacement to a kettle I had owned for years. A kettle that, while inexpensive, did the job quickly and reliably. I chose this kettle because of the features and aesthetics. I spent double what I had paid for my old kettle. It arrived and it is much bulkier than I had hoped for.......its awkward to handle. Additionally, it takes a very long time for the water to boil. I was actually unpleasantly surprised. It does look cool when its on in a darkened kitchen.....kind of like an alien spacecraft.......in my opinion its not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi K.

customer_reviews.title: I boils water quickly, and it's pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I use this new pot daily to boil water for French Press coffee. It's fast, I like the light, I like the automatic. shut-off. Unlike my previous water-boiler it does not tell me the exact temperature of the water, nor does it hold the temperature at a chosen setting. But it was about 1/4 the price of my old water boiler, it was delivered very quickly, it's an attractive shape, I like that the cord length on the counter can be kept short (by winding part of the cord in the base. I like that I will be able to clean it with vinegar rather than an expensive descaling solution, Overall, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible lid design
customer_reviews.text: It only opens to about a 45 degree angle. Great if you want to jam the tap into the kettle and fill it that way, but we use a Brita pitcher. Thus, we tried to pry the lid open a bit more to prevent spills, and it simple broke off. Dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Central Scrutinizer

customer_reviews.title: Good for 5 month and it goes bad.
customer_reviews.text: Had it since oct 2019 product stop boiling water. Shuts off. Was reading review now to see why it does that. The thermostat went bad. Do not bad. Rating of product will not last you more than 6 month. By the time you realize is too late to return. Amazon need to remove this product.
customer_reviews.author: bebewinky

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning Product
customer_reviews.text: We had our first one for over a year, the only issue was the lid spring broke from us filling it with water in the fridge door. I ordered a replacement since after a year with heavy use, it held up decent. The replacement worked less than two months and the auto shut off was malfunctioning. The button was not switching completely causing the kettle to turn back on by itself empty. I asked for a replacement from Amazon. This third one has lasted less than a week and now will not boil and it clicks for a long time after it shuts off. Needless to say, I will not be ordering a 4th one.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: C.H.E.A.P.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, how disappointing is it to get a product and on the same day it arrives, it has to be repackaged for return? The top/lid doesn't work. It's made of the cheapest imaginable plastic and simply doesn't function. The problem is you have to press a button on the lid so it will (hopefully) pop open so the pot can be filled. The button doesn't work. The lid won't pop open. The pot can't be filled. Minus stars for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Avowed Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Burned plastic taste
customer_reviews.text: Essentially the mouth of it seems to have melted or something. Smells like burned plastic and water, and thus, team and coffee taste terrible. Worked fine for the first couple months.
customer_reviews.author: megaphone

customer_reviews.title: Great kettle for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I had a $40 electric kettle before I dropped it and broke it, unfortunately. On the market for another one, I stumbled across this little gem, which looked beautiful (I love glass kettles!) and decided to give it a try. I find it easy to use, looks very attractive, and has a very wide opening so it will be easy to clean. I make tea every morning and it helps that it heats up water very quickly. I'm not sure about durability, as I haven't had the product for that long. But, recommended and would buy again when I'm in the market for another kettle.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Handy
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We love this kettle. My husband has had to abandon coffee for herbal teas for health reasons. He was using our Keurig for his hot water, but it was getting kind of annoying that he was using all the water in the reservoir for his tea. Decided to get him this handy pot and so glad we did. Looks great, brings water to a boil super fast and shuts itself off when boil has been reached. Love the light that comes on when the unit is heating. Components are very solid... nothing cheap or flimsy. Packaging was perfect. Very glad we got this pot.
customer_reviews.author: Rhian Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, RAPID Boil Kettle
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely kettle! The design is very nice and looks good on my counter, which is always a plus! I enjoy the blue light purely for the aesthetic, however it is a nice indicator to tell you it’s done boiling. The boil is RAPID too! It’s incredibly quick! The auto-off upon reaching boiling is wonderful as well! Functions perfectly and helps keep things safe. Only down is how small the top opening is, I don’t think I’ll be able to fit my hand inside for cleaning but that’s easily remedied with a bottle cleaning brush or something of the like, so it’s not to big a deal, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Gray

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, it's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The design, minimalistic, LED light, boils 1.8 L in just 4-5 minutes. I don't care if it's made in China as the quality is awesome! Will buy the coffee maker from this company. Just wondering why some people (not so smart) are giving this product 1 star only because it's made in China, poor intellect...
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I still can't figure out how to get the mesh spout filter out for cleaning purposes. Also, there was a small amount of what appears to be glue in the bottom of the glass protion of the unit. The lid doesn't open very far and it was difficult to get my hand/arm down far enough to scrub the area to remove the glue. I was afraid if I tried to force open the lid too far it would snap off. I did follow the first use directions, but the glue remained. That, however, is my only complaint. Otherwise, this is just perfect for my morning tea. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: everlastingstarflower

customer_reviews.title: Overall, perfect for anyone; simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: The suggested initial sanitizing involved filling the kettle up to the 1.8L line and letting it cycle to a boil. It shuts off automatically once temperature is reached. This first run took about 8 minutes for a full pot. After rinsing I filled it to 1.0L and turned it on. Boiling time was just over 3 mins. Way superior to my stove top kettle that takes 7 minutes at half full. CAUTION: WHEN EMPTYING KETTLE AFTER USE BE SURE TO ALLOW IT COMPLETELY COOL DOWN BEFORE PRESSING THE BUTTON THAT OPENS THE LID. HOT WATER DROPLETS WILL SPRAY ALL OVER YOU AS THE LID SPRINGS UP! I found this out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Larocque

customer_reviews.title: not reliable
customer_reviews.text: At first i liked everything about the kettle. Then a little over a month after getting it the kettle started turning itself on. The next week the lights wouldn't go on nor did it boil. Now it won't go on at all. I got this to replace a kettle I had for 18 year that finally wore out. This on barely lasted 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Thunell

customer_reviews.title: came used and missing base
customer_reviews.text: ordered a new item, it came with water stains inside it and no base. couldnt even try it. it was like an appliance you picked up at a yardsale with no cord. worthless junk.
customer_reviews.author: Danester

customer_reviews.title: RUST after two weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Used it for only two weeks and it's already rusting. Tried proven methods from online DIY sites with no success to rid of them. I'm in the process of returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah T

customer_reviews.title: Will not last long
customer_reviews.text: This kettle is ok for a while but after 6 months it’s probably going to stop working. That’s what happened to ours. Would stop boiling and sometimes would start boiling on its own!!!! Do not buy. This is a safety issue.
customer_reviews.author: PHou

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Practical Design, Superb Warranty Service
customer_reviews.text: I was drawn to this model for its design, which looks great on my granite and slate counters. I love the blue 'on' LEDs, ease of use and very rapid boiling times. The first unit I had developed an issue with the heating element, but even though the return period had ended, the warranty period had not, and the warranty service response was fast, personal and very professional. It was literally just an email (or call) to start and I was taken care of promptly and courteously. A great product with that excellent a warranty behind it deserves a first (and second) look. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Fox

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading reviews thinking I would love it HOWEVER after reading the directions, cleaning and care of this item I boxed it right back up and will give it as a gift.!! I 2 stars because of the time and cleaning that is recommended in the instructions, I wanted simple and easy so I bought the Hamilton Beach one from Amazon which IS GREAT IN ALL AREAS and was much cheaper in price as well.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kettle- I dislike the plastic smell though!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my previous glass kettle and it works much better. I like that the entire kettle illuminates when it’s on (the previous one I had only had a tiny light) and that it is easy to fill and turn on and off. The water seems to cool faster in this than my other one, which is disappointing, so I find myself reheating it more. The water also has a slightly off-plastic taste. I’m hoping that goes away with time. I’ve cleaned the kettle appropriately, so I’m not really sure of the issue. Overall I’m pleased. I love the design and the capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie George

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP AND BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: Received this new kettle and right away the lid release button did not open the lid all the way and it was never consistent. Thought it was just the way it was meant to be! Turns out it was broken from day one...Bad design. Of course, out of the window for a return. Guess I will go back to my old Hamilton Kettle which has lasted for over 8 years now and still going strong. So hard to find good quality products that last today!
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: It Shuts Off Automatically
customer_reviews.text: I never realized the difference it made to have an electric kettle over your traditional stove-top one. A) it heats water faster B) it shuts off when it’s ready (which is a game changer if you’re like me & you wander off just to come back & see your kettle is having a nervous breakdown) & C) it’s easier to clean (just don’t put it in the dishwasher). It’s also quite large, so you won’t have to constantly refill it. Hurray, now I have an extra burner space on my stove lol.
customer_reviews.author: Raylees

customer_reviews.title: It lost a star because...
customer_reviews.text: ...it doesn't notify you when its done boiling. So don't walk away and expect to know when its done. It doesn't take long though, so even antsy-pants people like myself wont be too hard pressed to stick around until it is ready, but sometimes I am in lalaland and I don't get pulled back down to earth in a timely manner by a warning click or beep. Otherwise, it is a huge time saver. I hated leaving my tea kettle on the range and then when we cook it gets all greasy and gross, but it was convenient being there. This is 1,000,000 times more convenient. I love it and am so happy I purchased one!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier and worth getting a second.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. It does its job well. The blue light adds a nice wow factor and useful to know when it is on. I had to get used to the switch being on top because previous electric kettles had it down. I prefer this location. The best thing about it and what sold me to it was the top ppart is not made of glass so it isn't easy to crack or chip. My previous one (different brand) chipped and became useless. I already got a second one so they can share the same electric base. One to use for drinking water and the other for making tea and coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolaos K. Tsouhlarakis

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great looking, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My old plastic kettle with heating element in the kettle finally broke, and I had remembered seeing kettles like this on my travels overseas. What I really like is that the heating element is the base, but it does not get hot to the touch, and you can pick it up and pour wherever you need to without worrying about the cord. It brings water to a boil fast, and has great-appearing lights in the base that will let you know when it's ready. I must say I found this on Amazon by filtering for highest-rated, and then looked for the best price. I received it sooner than expected also.
customer_reviews.author: Greyhawk

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months. A waste if money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 05/2020, no longer working 07/2020. Worked well while it lasted. Had high hopes that were dashed this morning when it wouldn’t turn on. Unplugged and plugged. Checked dock and nothing worked. Disappointed ☹️ Don’t waste your money. Beginning to doubt the validity of so many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna

customer_reviews.title: This kettle is perfect for coffee, tea or hot chocolate! 💕
customer_reviews.text: This cordless kettle is absolutely fabulous! My entire family loves it!❤️ It is so easy to use with the cordless design and very heavy duty with cool LED lights. My kids love to use it for hot chocolate all the time and my hubby and I enjoy it for making coffee and tea. I’m a little obsessed with tea... So this kettle gets Used every single day! I would highly recommend this to anyone! It would also make an awesome wedding gift!☀️
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pour over coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Mueller product that I have purchased. In fact I am using this to make pour over coffee with coffee that I have ground using their conical grinder. The quality is very nice and the kettle seems to be very durable. Love that it has the LED lights which will automatically turn off when this comes to a boil and shuts off automatically. Quick to get water to boiling and makes great tasting pour over coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This water heater is incredible. It's so fast, so consistent, and beautiful to boot. It's definitely become a part of my morning ritual for brewing a much quicker cup of coffee out of my French press, but I could see it being useful for a lot of applications. It's a little difficult to clean because of the size of the opening, but it's worth it for the functionality and the design. Waking up to those blue bubbles is a mesmerizing thing. Plus I only use clean water in it so it stays pretty clean. A little pricey but worth the investment 😉
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Kettle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kettle so much. For those people who are having problems with condensation, always empty the kettle when done using and leave the lid open to let the water evaporate. No more condensation. Same thing with rust spots. Always empty the kettle when done and leave the lid open for water to evaporate. No more rust. This is such a lovely kettle. Easy to use and easy to clean. It's very pretty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Update--this kettle, while nice looking, stopped working after 10 months. Poor quality! We went back to a non-mechanical tea kettle for the stove. We have had this kettle for six months now, and it is still working like a dream and looking like new! It heats quickly, has markings on the side to measure your water, has a pretty blue glow while heating, and is easy to fill. If I could improve anything about it, I would ask for larger print markings, and/or markings in the front of the kettle too. We are very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yogini Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking and Economical
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a week now. I like the looks of the kettle. It is well balanced and does what it is supposed to do - heats water to boiling fast and turns off automatically. I like the feel of the handle. The only thing I do not like is it would be hard to clean although I suppose you would just use the cleaner for coffee pots to remove scale. The only drawback is the lid which you cannot remove, but it pops up so you can fill. I would rather the lid came off completely. Other than that, a good product at a remarkably low price compared to the others I looked into.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Slow, but Lasting well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kettle awhile ago, so it has lasted well for the price. I've given it 3 stars based on the longevity & quality. But be warned, it takes forever to boil for 2cups , worse at max water level. Even though the title says Speedboil. It also has to be cleaned of limescale weekly, Florida water is not great. But even If i fill with bottled water, it still limes up, but it does have a little filter by the spout to catch the bits. It's good for the price I paid, but once this needs replacing I'll buy a proper quick boil one.
customer_reviews.author: MISS C L SHAW

customer_reviews.title: Great kettle
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend is cut off. I was traveling and I saw one in a hotel I was staying in. I have a share with you but I will tell you that in a boil the water very quickly and safely and I’m a tea drinker which I love using because it has a filter in the Spout so if Im using loose tea or a teabag that rips, it will catch on a little pieces automatically for you and you can clean the filter and/or replace it. It’s a good solid product and better than the more expensive goose neck stainless electric kettles.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to use ( I was worried I’d have to read through a novel of instructions in order to use). Heats up much faster than boiling on water on the stove top- and the convenience of being able to use this at my desk is huge- especially right now where our kitchen at work is closed due to Covid-19 ( no microwave,toaster, or hot/cold water from the dispenser is allowed right now) I also used it for instant soup and it was great. This is a lifesaver and great alternative during Covid-19 and just overall convenient product. Really glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Spontaneous on: DANGER!
customer_reviews.text: I was awoken twice last night by this thing (got it @ Sept 1) which had turned itself on and was boiling water!I unplugged it and am scared to plug it back in!
customer_reviews.author: Prescott Computer LLC

customer_reviews.title: Nice! When working.  Positive resolution with seller. Seller IS approachable and amenable.
customer_reviews.text: Using to boil water for tea and coffee. Worked well until too late for refund. Now water never boils. Unit shuts down after a few minutes of heating and will not turn back on for several hours. Be sure to unplug unit after it stops as unit has started itself up again without human intervention. Pretty blue light comes on when unit is on. Difficult to clean. Seller did outreach after review posted offering replacement. I am open to re-review in next 60 days. Perhaps my first unit is anomaly.
customer_reviews.author: wheatfreeVda

customer_reviews.title: Lid broke in less than a year of use
customer_reviews.text: Kettle did what kettles do, for a little while. Purchased this in January and by September the hinge for the lid broke in multiple places under normal use. Previous kettle lasted several years. Was definitely hoping I wouldn't be buying another kettle so soon.
customer_reviews.author: cpeter

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long an electric kettle usually last, but this lasted just 1 year. It started to leak at the base near the handle and had water all over the floor. Luckily it wasn't scalding water. When not leaking, it's a great kettle. We use it about 4-5 times a day because it's convenient and quick to boil water. Only real complaint is the opening is really small which makes it hard to add water or clean it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Several great features that outwin the other competitions
customer_reviews.text: I looked hard for a kettle and this one was the one that stood out for me because it had an auto turn off and it also reached temperatures to kill any bacteria that was in my water which I could cool down and put in the fridge and drink later. I enjoy the nice ambient light in it to aid me in the dark so I don’t have to flip the light on when going in the kitchen and it’s great for travel and enough for me and others. Great size for several cups of water ever beverages you use. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miley G

customer_reviews.title: I had one of these when I had a baby and we love it!
customer_reviews.text: Once my daughter was born this thing made our lives alot easier. Well one day it stopped working as she got older and I missed it! I saw that this one was being sold and I jumped right on it! This thing is great for so many things like, Raman Noodles and even for breaking down spices to go into stews! I happy with mine and the best part of it is that it turned BLUE while it's boiling!! We just love it as a family!! Do buy this amazing piece toake life easier for you ❤️
customer_reviews.author: ami

customer_reviews.title: Stay away :(
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faulty- without the filter and it does not switch off after the water boils which is a very serious safety concern. Disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid won't open when pressed.
customer_reviews.text: After using it 2 weeks the lid won't open when pressed. I have to press each side and hope that it eventually pops open so I can add water. This is a big nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: monica t

customer_reviews.title: Be VERY careful!
customer_reviews.text: This kettle worked fine for a while but then it just started turning itself on automatically. One time it did in during the night when we were sleeping. We heard a strange noise from the kitchen and thankfully got to it early as it had no water in it, and was making a big noise. It happened a few times more after that, in which time we ordered a new (different brand) kettle. I'm told we can't have a refund as it was over 30 days, which seems crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.
